#byte-size
Convert a value in bytes to a more human-readable size.

####Example
```js
> var biteSize = require("bite-size");
> biteSize(10000)
'10 KB'
> biteSize(10000, 1)
'9.8 KB'
> biteSize(10000, 2)
'9.77 KB'
> biteSize(10000, 3)
'9.766 KB'
```
